tool.name: TileLayout

param.name: Boundary_Shapefile_Path
param.dialogReference: Boundary the tile layout will be based on.
param.pythonReference: Boundary the tile layout will be based on. The boundary needs to have a projection. The tool can also be run on a DGN polygon but the output shapefile wil not have projection information.

param.name: Output_Shapefile
param.pythonReference: Output location of the shapefile. The location the shapefile will be saved to.

param.name: Width
param.dialogReference: Tile Width. The Length will be in the same unit as the coordinate system.
param.pythonReference: Tile Width. The horizontal length of the tiles, the X value.

param.name: Height
param.dialogReference: Tile Height. The length will be the same as the coordinate system.
param.pythonReference: Tile Width. The vertical length of the tiles, the Y value.

param.name: Prefix
param.dialogReference: Prefix that will be added to the tile name.
param.pythonReference: Prefix that will be added to the tile name.

tool.summary: This tool creates a layout based on Woolpert's formula for tile creation. The lower-left coordinates will based on the 100,000 coordinates. A prefix can be added to the name of the tile. The prefix is optional. The width and height can be set to the user's specifications. The output shapefile will be the in the same coordinate system as the boundary tile.
tool.usage: Used to create a tile layout for delivery tiles.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool creates a layout based on Woolpert's formula for tile creation. The lower-left coordinates will based on the 100,000 coordinates. A prefix can be added to the name of the tile. The prefix is optional. The width and height can be set to the user's specifications. The output shapefile will be the in the same coordinate system as the boundary tile.
